name: Nena
description: '''Nena''' was a West German [[Neue Deutsche Welle]] band formed in [[West Berlin]] in 1981. In 1983 and 1984, their German-language song "{{Lang|de|[[99 Luftballons]]|italic=no}}" (and its English version, "99 Red Balloons") reached number one in the singles charts of countries around the world.
